  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    UserHomePage
    Constructs the UserHomePage and initializes the layout and user interface components.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UserProfileWindow
    Pop-up window displaying a users's profile including their contact information and questions/reviews
    UserQuestionDisplay
    UserQuestionDisplay page shows the current user's questions (and reserved space for answers).
    UserStaffChatWindow
    The UserStaffChatWindow class represents a pop-up window for normal users to chat with staff.
